articles.description: The notable increase in heart attacks and untimely deaths has been a cause for alarm, highlighting the shift of cardiac ailments to a considerably younger age group
articles.content: In recent times, several seemingly healthy celebrities have suffered heart attacks, revealing a startling truth about the lack of awareness regarding ones physical condition. The latest actor to suff… [+5874 chars]
